notes: Interrupts the user's channeling spells upon cast.
Multiple casts of Endurance do not stack the buff, but refresh the duration instead.
Only affects player controlled units, including invulnerable units, excluding wards.
abilities.name: Endurance
abilities.description: Gives +35 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds.

notes: The aura's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
Fully stacks with other sources of movement speed bonuses, except for Swiftness Auras of multiple Drums.
abilities.name: Swiftness Aura
abilities.description: Gives 6% movement speed to nearby allies.

description: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.
trivia: In the original DotA, this item was called Ancient Janggo of Endurance.
tips: Use the active while attacking buildings with your team to destroy them faster.
Works on controlled units like Necronomicons and stack with the archer's bonus movement speed aura.
attrs: Bonus +6 Strength +6 Agility +6 Intelligence +1.5 Mana regeneration
info: For strength heroes, it grants 135 health, 0.75 health regen, 0.6% magic resistance, 0.96 armor, 6 attack speed, 0.3% movement speed, 72 mana, 1.8 mana regen, 0.42% spell damage and 6 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 108 health, 0.6 health regen, 0.48% magic resistance, 1.2 armor, 7.5 attack speed, 0.38% movement speed, 72 mana, 1.8 mana regen, 0.42% spell damage and 6 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 108 health, 0.6 health regen, 0.48% magic resistance, 0.96 armor, 6 attack speed, 0.3% movement speed, 90 mana, 1.88 mana regen, 0.53% spell damage and 6 attack damage. Together with the active ability, it grants a total of 41 attack speed to the owner.
The item does not disappear upon using up all charges.
The charges can be replenished by purchasing the recipe again.
